name: Piloncillo Almond Butter Oatmeal Cookies
description: These piloncillo almond butter oatmeal cookies are the perfect sweet treat, and they just so happen to be vegan too.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine flax seed, water, piloncillo, almond butter, apple sauce, and vanilla. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, combine flax seed, water, piloncillo, almond butter, apple sauce, and vanilla. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine flour, oats, raisins, salt, cinnamon, clove, baking powder, and baking soda.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine flour, oats, raisins, salt, cinnamon, clove, baking powder, and baking soda.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, and use a wooden spoon to mix until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, and use a wooden spoon to mix until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the dough by heaping tablespoons on a parchment lined sheet tray, 2 inches apart. Flatten cookies slightly with your fingers.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the dough by heaping tablespoons on a parchment lined sheet tray, 2 inches apart. Flatten cookies slightly with your fingers.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15 min. or until golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 15 min. or until golden brown.

keywords: almond butter oatmeal cookies, vegan oatmeal cookies
